name: cppkies2cash
description: Cppkies2Cash is a modding framework for the toy app Cookies2Cash. It intends to make modding the app very simple.

scripts.code-test: npm run prodBuild && npm run eslint
scripts.prodBuild: rm dist -rf && echo {\"prod\":true} > isprod.json && export NODE_ENV="production" && npm run build && npm run build-dts
scripts.watch: echo {\"prod\":false} > isprod.json && export NODE_ENV="development"&&npm run build -- --watch
scripts.watch-esm: echo {\"prod\":false} > isprod.json && export NODE_ENV="development" CPPKIES_ESM_DEBUGGING="yes" && npm run build -- --watch

author: Cppkies team
